title: Piracy - actual and attempted attacks worldwide by country 2019
summary: This bar chart has 7 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Number of incidents in each Country on the y axis.
The Number of incidents is appeared to be the highest at Country Nigeria and lowest at Country Venezuela.
The highest value at Country Nigeria is 5.83x times more than the lowest value at Venezuela.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Number of incidents in the y axis.
The maximum Number of incidents 35.0 is found at Country Nigeria and the minimum is found at Venezuela where Country is 6.0.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 7 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Number of incidents in each Country on the y axis.
The Number of incidents is appeared to be the highest at Country Nigeria and lowest at Country Venezuela.
The highest value at Country Nigeria is 5.83x times more than the lowest value at Venezuela.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of incidents for 7 number of Countrys.
The Number of incidents is appeared to be the highest at Country Nigeria and lowest at Country Venezuela.
Second maximum Number of incidents is found at Country Indonesia.
There is a difference of 29.0 between the maximum Country Nigeria and minimum Country Venezuela.
The Country Nigeria has the highest Number of incidents, followed by Indonesia, and Singapore Staits. Down to the Country Venezuela which is the lowest.
Similar Number of incidents is found in Country Venezuela, and Cameroon.
The Country Venezuela tends to be 2.33 percent lower than average.
